The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug

wikitext.*:
{{Adaptation}} {{infobox character | people=[[Orcs|Orc]] | name=Narzug | image=The Hobbit - The Desolation of Smaug - Narzug.jpg | caption="Narzug" from ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location= | affiliation=[[Azog|Azog's]] [[Orcs|Orc pack]]
[[Eye of Sauron|Necromancer of Dol Guldur]] | language=[[Black Speech]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{TA|2941}} | deathlocation=[[Elvenking's Halls]] | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Narzug''' was an [[Orcs|Orc]] who was a part of [[Azog|Azog's]] pack. Narzug was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Hobbit (film series)|''Hobbit'' film series]], where he was portrayed by [[Ben Mitchell]]. == History == When the pack had caught up with [[Thorin]] and his [[Thorin and Company|Company]] during their escape from the [[Woodland Realm]], Narzug was ultimately taken prisoner by [[Legolas]] and [[Tauriel]], and they took him with them back to the [[Elvenking's Halls]]. [[Thranduil]], promising to spare his life, interrogated about why the pack had been pursuing the company of [[Dwarves]], and Narzug claimed that his master was in the service of the "[[Sauron|One]]"; this caused some alarm to the Elven-king, triggering him to cut off Narzug's head. Legolas complained to his father that he promised otherwise to the captive, with Thranduil dismissing it, saying that he did a favor to the Orc.''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' {{References}} [[Category:Orcs from adaptations]] [[Category:The Hobbit (film series) characters]] [[fi:Narzug (elokuvahahmo)]]
